column3: Latest;Kompong Thom: The remains of 10 volunteer soldiers of Vietnam were repatriated on the afternoon of January 9
column4: 2020.------Groups from Cambodia and Vietnam are still searching for more members of the Vietnamese volunteer corps killed in action in Cambodia between 1979-89.------Another 76 bodies are known to lie in Kampong Thom province
column5: according to a search of technicians and eyewitness information. Work will continue to find them and send them back to Vietnam. ------KPT
